favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

layout_content_fullwidth.label: Enable fullwidth
layout_content_fullwidth.info: It will set the width of content 100% of the viewport.

layout_content_width.label: Custom width
layout_content_width.info: Only applicable, if Fullwidth disabled. Set the maximum width of the content.

layout_content_margin.label: Margin
layout_content_margin.info: Set the value to leave the space on left and right side of the page.

layout_content_margin_desktop.label: Margin on desktop
layout_content_margin_desktop.info: This value will be applied only for desktop screens.

layout_section_vertical_spacing.label: Base section spacing level
layout_section_vertical_spacing.info: Set the base spacing value for top and bottom of each section. Range from 1 to 10.

layout_section_columns_gap.label: Base columns gap level
layout_section_columns_gap.info: Set the base spacing value between each columns. Range from 1 to 10.

color_general_lite.label: Lite
color_general_lite.info: Used as foreground color for background colors.

heading_library_font.label: Heading font (from library)
heading_library_font.info: This font will be applied to all headings.

heading_use_theme_font.label: Use theme fonts
heading_use_theme_font.info: It will use theme font over shopify's library of fonts for your heading.

heading_theme_font.label: Heading font (from theme)
heading_theme_font.info: Only applicable, if "Use theme fonts" enabled.

default_library_font.label: Default font (from library)
default_library_font.info: This font will be applied to all texts except headings.

default_use_theme_font.label: Use theme fonts
default_use_theme_font.info: It will use theme font over shopify's library of fonts for your text.

default_theme_font.label: Default font (from theme)
default_theme_font.info: Only applicable, if "Use theme fonts" enabled.

special_library_font.label: Special font (from library)
special_library_font.info: This font will be applied to all special texts.

special_use_theme_font.label: Use theme fonts
special_use_theme_font.info: It will use theme font over shopify's library of fonts for your special text.

special_theme_font.label: Special font (from theme)
special_theme_font.info: Only applicable, if "Use theme fonts" enabled.

buttons_padding.label: Base button padding level
buttons_padding.info: Set the base padding value for buttons. Value shown is multiple of 100. Ranges from 10 to 200.

predictive_search_enabled.label: Enable predictive search
predictive_search_enabled.info: It will perform instant search when you start typing.

predictive_search_unavailable_products.label: Out of stock products
predictive_search_unavailable_products.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled.

predictive_search_prefix.label: Partial word match
predictive_search_prefix.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled.

predictive_search_collections.label: Include collections
predictive_search_collections.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled. It will include results from collections along with products.

predictive_search_pages.label: Include pages
predictive_search_pages.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled. It will include results from pages along with products.

predictive_search_articles.label: Include blog posts
predictive_search_articles.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled. It will include results from articles along with products.

predictive_search_results_limit.label: Results limit
predictive_search_results_limit.info: Only applicable, when predictive search enabled.

predictive_search_recommendation.label: Enable recommendation
predictive_search_recommendation.info: It will display pre-defined list of products to choose from.

product_option_swatches_name.label: Option name of swatches
product_option_swatches_name.info: Enter the option name you used inside for product variants. for ex. Color. Split with comma for multiple names.

product_option_swatches_list.label: Option values of swatches
product_option_swatches_list.info: Enter values in a key pairs format. for ex. Olive: #50462B, Maroon: #69232D. [Learn more](https://agnidesigns.com/doc/nostalgia/advanced/how-to-setup-color-swatches/)

collection_show_swatches.label: Show swatches
collection_show_swatches.info: Only applicable, if swatches are used.

cart_show_drawer.label: Enable cart drawer
cart_show_drawer.info: It will open the side drawer when products added to cart.

cart_show_order_notes.label: Show order notes
cart_show_order_notes.info: It will display notes field to cart.

cart_enable_free_shipping.label: Show free shipping bar
cart_enable_free_shipping.info: It will display notes field to cart.

cart_free_shipping_threshold.label: Minimum amount for free shipping
cart_free_shipping_threshold.info: Enter the amount without currency & thousand separator. for ex. 100

newsletter_popup_enable.label: Enable popup
newsletter_popup_enable.info: It will display newsletter/promotional popup automatically once site loaded.

fullwidth.label: Enable fullwidth
fullwidth.info: It will allow this section to occupy full width of the viewport if needed.

width.label: Width
width.info: Only applicable, if fullwidth is disabled.

slideshow_transition_interval.label: Autoplay interval
slideshow_transition_interval.info: Only applicable, if autoplay is enabled

slide_image_mobile.label: Image
slide_image_mobile.info: This image will be applied to all devices based on desktop image availablity.

slide_image_mobile_overlay_color.label: Overlay color
slide_image_mobile_overlay_color.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_image_mobile_overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
slide_image_mobile_overlay_opacity.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_image.label: Image on desktop
slide_image.info: (Optional) This will be the main or left side image based on right side image availablity.

slide_image_overlay_color.label: Overlay color
slide_image_overlay_color.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_image_overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
slide_image_overlay_opacity.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_image_right_enable.label: Use image on desktop (right side)
slide_image_right_enable.info: (Optional) This image will be applied to right side, if present.

slide_image_right_overlay_color.label: Overlay color
slide_image_right_overlay_color.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_image_right_overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity
slide_image_right_overlay_opacity.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

slide_heading_width.label: Width
slide_heading_width.info: Set the maximum width of the heading shown inside the slide content.

slide_subheading_width.label: Width
slide_subheading_width.info: Set the maximum width of the subheading shown inside the slide content.

slide_description_width.label: Width
slide_description_width.info: Set the maximum width of the description shown inside the slide content.

slide_button_1_target.label: Target
slide_button_1_target.info: Only applicable, if button text is not empty.

slide_button_1_custom_width.label: Use custom button width
slide_button_1_custom_width.info: It will make the button to custom width

slide_button_1_width.label: Width
slide_button_1_width.info: Only applicable, If custom width set. It defines max. width of the content on desktop

slide_button_2_target.label: Target
slide_button_2_target.info: Only applicable, if button text is not empty.

slide_button_2_custom_width.label: Use custom button width
slide_button_2_custom_width.info: It will make the button to custom width

slide_button_2_width.label: Width
slide_button_2_width.info: Only applicable, If custom width set. It defines max. width of the content on desktop

separator.label: Use separator
separator.info: It will display the underline at the end of the section

separator_width.label: Width
separator_width.info: Set the width of the separator in percentage.

spacing.label: Use spacing
spacing.info: It will add space to the top and bottom of the section

spacing_placement.label: Placement
spacing_placement.info: Set the placements to display the space above or below the section

fullwidth.label: Enable fullwidth
fullwidth.info: It will allow this section to occupy full width of the viewport if needed.

width.label: Width
width.info: Only applicable, if fullwidth is disabled.

inset.label: Use inner padding
inset.info: If color scheme is not default, it will add padding around the section. if color scheme is default and no layout margin, it will add padding on left and right sides.

button_target.label: Target
button_target.info: Only applicable, if button text is not empty.

rows_count.label: Number of rows
rows_count.info: If carousel enabled, it will be used as "number of slides".

gap.label: Use gap
gap.info: It will add the space between the columns

per_move.label: Items per move
per_move.info: Set the number of items to move on each transition.

background_video.label: Video on desktop
background_video.info: (Optional) This will display the video on desktops.

background_overlay_color.label: Overlay color
background_overlay_color.info: Only applicable, when overlay is enabled.

background_overlay_opacity.label: Overlay opacity

content_width.info: Set the width of the content for the image banner.
